Schema Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Schema is a utility class for handling the GML 2.1.2 version of the GML Sschema.


Static Public Member Functions

static NAMESPACE_OSGEO_COMMON_XML::XmlReader * CreateReader ()
 Constructs an GML 2.1.2 schema reader. This reader reads an XML document containing the GML 2.1.2 and Xlinks schemas.
